document.full_text: united nations secretary general ban ki-moon said on thursday he had raised the issue of the possible violation of human rights with syrian president bashar al-assad during a phone conversation a day earlier.
document.title: u.n. chief says he raised rights violations with assad
lines_and_colors: united nations secretary general ban ki-moon said on thursday he had raised the issue of the possible violation of human rights with syrian president bashar al-assad during a phone conversation a day earlier.
